commit message:
Moved the code that converts a gallery span to the gallery shortcode when saving an uploaded post.

The code had no effect because it was applying to `postContentEditable` after it had already been applied to the `content` string.

Note: Galleries still saved fine for local drafts because that is handled in the WPHtml.toHtml() method.

Fixes #1437

Merge pull request #1438 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1437-gallery-uploaded-post

Fix #1437: Gallery shortcodes not saving when editing uploaded post
First pass at reblog redesign (incomplete)
Second pass at reblog redesign (incomplete)
Third pass at reblog redesign (works, but progress during reblog needs refinement)
Refined progress while reblog is in progress
Spinner indent now matches post excerpt
Removed spinner in favor of dropdown ActionBar
Wrapped reblog content in a ScrollView so it will scroll up when soft keyboard appears
Reblog excerpt now uses same font sizes as post list excerpt
Added animation to reblog editor when it first appears
Changed reblog animation
Added fade out when submitting reblog
Tweaked reblog animation (again)
Decreased height of featured image in reblog activity
Added view holder to ReaderReblogAdapter
Fixed bug that cause 'Settings' link not to work (when no visible blogs to reblog to), simplified initial animation

First pass at changes to support ?meta=site,feed on /read/following/mine endpoint
* Remove ReaderFollowedBlog and ReaderFollowedBlogList
* Added feedId to reader blog model and feed_id column to reader blog table
* ReaderSubsActivity now shows feeds as well as blogs
2nd pass at changes to support ?meta=site,feed on /read/following/mine endpoint
3rd pass at changes to support ?meta=site,feed on /read/following/mine endpoint
Updated to support field name changes made on backend
Reblog icon is now hidden for private posts (similar change will be made to the iOS app)
Switched to two-level ActionBar dropdown, with 'REBLOG TO' appearing above the blog name.
'You have no visible blogs...' message is now centered
Reduced and bolded REBLOG TO
Fixed SQLiteException when manually adding a blog by URL

Merge pull request #1440 from wordpress-mobile/feature/1439-reblog-redesign

Feature/1439 reblog redesign
Fixed code style issues
Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/WordPress-Android into issue/1443-read-following-mine

Merge pull request #1443 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1443-read-following-mine

Issue/1443 read following mine
fix #1444: use default theme color on image settings checkboxes
code style
add Hebrew and Basque to our list
fix #1447: manually restore the activity - because of the dualpane <-> singlepane code (7 inches tablet)

Merge pull request #1445 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1444-image-settings-style

fix #1444: use default theme color on image settings checkboxes

Merge pull request #1448 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1447-comment-fragment-detail-stacked

fix #1447: manually restore the activity - because of the dualpane <-> singlepane code (7 inches tablet)

Assign the posts format spinner to an instance variable instead of using findViewById each time we save.

Also added a null and index check when getting post format value. Fixes #1449

Merge pull request #1450 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1449-post-format-npe

Fix NPE in EditPostSettingsFragment

Fixes #1451 and #1407 by standardizing the maximum width for bitmaps that we are adding to spans in the editor.

* Made all ImageHelper methods static.
* Changed `getMaximumThumbnailWidth()` in EditPostContentFragment to accommodate for 48dp of padding on each side, instead of where it was being calculated in ImageHelper.getThumbnailForWPImageSpan(). This allows ImageHelper.getScaledBitmapAtLongestSide to also use this to resize to the proper dimensions. This ensures that all bitmaps we are adding to the editor will be the correct size.
* Removed getThumbnailWidth() method since it is no longer needed.
Merge branch 'develop' into issue/1451-media-thumbnail-width
Fix #1453: check if SimperiumUtils.getNotesBucket() is null and display a toast instead of crashing
fix #1452: unhighlight comment rows on single pane comment list
Pass the scaled bitmap through getScaledBitmapAtLongestSide() in case we need to resize for portrait orientation.
ReaderPost.getFeaturedImageForDisplay() no longer skips Photon for https: images.
ReaderPhotoViewerActivity no longer skips Photon for https: images
ReaderPhotoViewerActivity now handles images from private posts

Merge pull request #1456 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1452-comment-row-highlited-single-pane

fix #1452: unhighlight comment rows on single pane comment list
WPNetworkImageView now enforces a max size to avoid loading large images into memory

Check for null GridFragment, and disable PTR if we're in multi-select mode.

Fixes #1458
Removing an empty line.

Merge pull request #1462 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1458-media-rotate-crash

Check for null GridFragment, and disable PTR if we're in multi-select mode

Merge pull request #1455 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1453-notification-crash

Fix #1453: check if SimperiumUtils.getNotesBucket() is null and display a toast instead of crashing
Fixes issue where rotation was incorrect for local image in post preview and editor.
Changed visibility of content textView to visible, so we can get its width.
ViewPostFragment now waits until mContentTextView has been laid out, so we can get its width and pass it to WPHtml.fromHtml()
WPHtml now accepts a maxImageWidth parameter, so that images can be properly sized when using fromHtml()

Base the max image width on the smallest dimension of the fragment's view.

Fixes issue where image could be too large if you rotated from landscape to portrait in the post view.

Also added AsyncTasks for loading local post content in EditPostContentFragment as well as EditPostPreviewFragment as they were blocking the UI thread.
Wrap fragment_edit_post_preview layout in a ScrollView so that the TextView can be scrolled if the content is larger than the view.
Made mMaxImageWidth not static, otherwise other threads could modify its value and cause unexpected results.
update translations
Images in private posts now enforce a max width, also fixed bug in ReaderPost.fromJson() that caused isPrivate to not be correctly set after visiting reader post detail
No longer enforcing a max size on photon images now that https://code.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/47 is merged
